data.title: Lincolnshire Spilsby
data.meta_description: 1601 Peregrine Bertie (13th Lord Willoughby de Eresby) www.flickr.com/photos/60861613@N00/14879689573/ flic.kr/p/pTWgWr , stands above his daughter Katerine, lady Watson He was the son of of Richard Bertie and Katherine , 12th Baroness Willoughby de Eresby www.flickr.com/photos/52219527@N00/515859512/ (widow of Charles Brandon, Duke of Suffolk whose 2 sons died young). Born whilst abroad in Mary Tudors reign. he was a Soldier and diplomat for Queen Elizabeth. (Diplomatic missions to Denmark and knighted on the field for valour against Spaniards in the Netherlands.) Governor of Berwick. He m (and separated from) Mary daughter of the John de Vere, 16th Earl of Oxford by Margaret Golding (Mary m2 Sir Eustace Hart who on her death m2 Jane (Benn) Evelyn www.flickr.com/photos/52219527@N00/10438880316/ ) Children 1. Peregrine 1639 m Margaret daughter of Nicholas Saunderson, 1st Viscount Castleton of Sandbeck by Mildred Elltoft 3. Henry 1655 m Dorothy Corbett 4. Vere 5. Roger 6. Ambrose 1. data.text:
1601 Peregrine Bertie (13th Lord Willoughby de Eresby) www.flickr.com/photos/60861613@N00/14879689573/ flic.kr/p/pTWgWr , stands above his daughter Katerine, lady Watson

He was the son of of Richard Bertie and Katherine , 12th Baroness Willoughby de Eresby www.flickr.com/photos/52219527@N00/515859512/ (widow of Charles Brandon, Duke of Suffolk whose 2 sons died young). Born whilst abroad in Mary Tudors reign. he was a Soldier and diplomat for Queen Elizabeth. (Diplomatic missions to Denmark and knighted on the field for valour against Spaniards in the Netherlands.) Governor of Berwick.

He m (and separated from) Mary daughter of the John de Vere, 16th Earl of Oxford by Margaret Golding (Mary m2 Sir Eustace Hart who on her death m2 Jane (Benn) Evelyn www.flickr.com/photos/52219527@N00/10438880316/ )

Children

1. Robert Bertie, 1st Earl of Lindsey 1583 – died at Edge Hill 24 October 1642 www.flickr.com/gp/52219527@N00/NC2U97 m Elizabeth Montagu d1654 daughter of Edward Montagu, 1st Baron Montagu of Boughton www.flickr.com/gp/52219527@N00/X34Pfg & Elizabeth heiress of Sir John Jeffrey of Chiddingly

1. Robert Bertie, 1st Earl of Lindsey 1583 – died at Edge Hill 24 October 1642 www.flickr.com/gp/52219527@N00/NC2U97 m Elizabeth Montagu d1654 daughter of Edward Montagu, 1st Baron Montagu of Boughton www.flickr.com/gp/52219527@N00/X34Pfg & Elizabeth heiress of Sir John Jeffrey of Chiddingly

2. Peregrine 1639 m Margaret daughter of Nicholas Saunderson, 1st Viscount Castleton of Sandbeck by Mildred Elltoft

3. Henry 1655 m Dorothy Corbett

4. Vere

5. Roger

6. Ambrose

1. Katherine d1610 m 1609 www.flickr.com/gp/52219527@N00/8g7Hhg Sir Lewis Watson 1st Baron 1653 who m2 1620 Eleanor flic.kr/p/dAgHKb daughter of Sir George Manners of Haddon Hall, Derbys by Grace Pierrepont flic.kr/p/dAgFF9
